Text:
Just because this is the way my mind works, I >watch< for things, bad things ...

As this is the only source currently available, nothing is yet to be done about it ...

@21:32 - Alan says:
"I've seen someone doing that in Thailand with a(glitch)country, slung over his shoulder on  a strap."

A pole of some sort that zaps things. If I find out, I'll post at least the text here.

This part is only in the XL version, so looking at the day previous' episode does no good.

First glitch in a johncymru encode I've seen.

AVIGUY
